Module AdrenalinaGame
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class LoginHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.LoginHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerFunctionalities, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
    public class LoginHandler
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements ServerFunctionalities
    Handles incoming connection from both rmi and socket registering the new client accordingly
    See Also:
